scripts.test:ui: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/tests/ui/hooks.ts --require src/tests/ui/steps/**/*.ts src/tests/ui/features/**/*.feature --format json:./reports/ui/cucumber-report-ui.json
scripts.test:ui:report: npm run test:ui && npm run generate:report:ui
scripts.test:api:report: npx playwright test --project="API Tests" && npx playwright show-report
